synopsis.text: Although Yoshino Somei, a high school student, has lived a peaceful life as the granddaughter of the powerful Osaka-based Somei yakuza family, her world is turned upside down when her grandfather forges a truce with the rival Miyama family from Tokyo. To seal the deal, Yoshino is betrothed to Kirishima Miyama, the charming yet enigmatic heir of the Miyama clan. As she navigates her new life in Tokyo and deals with the unwanted attention from Kirishima's fangirls, Yoshino discovers that her fianc√© is not as soft as he appears. In fact, he possesses a dark side that may rival even the most dangerous yakuza members she's ever encountered. Can Yoshino adapt to her new life and find a way to coexist with her twisted yakuza prince, or will their union reignite the feud between the two clans? Join Yoshino on her dramatic and romantic journey in Raise wa Tanin ga Ii as she faces the challenges of the underworld and learns the true meaning of love and loyalty.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
